alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Montezuma and west central La Plata Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 411 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Cortez, or 31 miles west of Durango, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mancos. This includes U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 41 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Four Corners, Upper Dolores River; Southwest San Juan Mountains
